TypeSignature.Value: public class ErrorProvider : System.ComponentModel.Component, System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ErrorProvider extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class ErrorProvider Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider, ISupportInitialize
type ErrorProvider = class inherit Component interface IExtenderProvider interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 提供用來表示表單上之控制項具有相關錯誤的使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for indicating that a control on a form has an error associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供簡單的機制，用於表示使用者在表單上的控制項有與其相關聯的錯誤。 presents a simple mechanism for indicating to the end user that a control on a form has an error associated with it. 如果控制項中指定的錯誤描述字串，則圖示會出現在控制項旁邊。If an error description string is specified for the control, an icon appears next to the control. 圖示閃爍中指定的方式，藉由指定的費率。The icon flashes in the manner specified by , at the rate specified by . 當滑鼠停留在圖示時，會出現工具提示顯示的錯誤描述字串。When the mouse hovers over the icon, a ToolTip appears showing the error description string. 一般而言，您可以使用與資料繫結控制項的關聯。Typically, you use in association with data-bound controls. 使用時與資料繫結控制項您必須指定，在建構函式，或藉由設定屬性。When using with data-bound controls, you must specify the , either in the constructor or by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 元件不提供協助工具用戶端的內建支援。The component does not provide built-in support for accessibility clients. 若要讓您的應用程式存取，使用此元件時中,，您必須提供額外的、 可存取的意見反應機制。To make your application accessible when using this component, you must provide an additional, accessible feedback mechanism. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以通知有資料項目錯誤的使用者。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立，其中包含控制控制項，和控制，每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用並屬性並和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，取決於控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有和表示使用者資料時發生錯誤。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. [!code-cpp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤圖示閃爍指定的速率。The error icon flashes at the specified rate. 值為零的集合至。A value of zero sets to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以通知有資料項目錯誤的使用者。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立，其中包含控制控制項，和控制，每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用並屬性並和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，取決於控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是您可以將附加至控制項的資料來源，而您想要監視錯誤。The is a data source that you can attach to a control and that you want to monitor for errors. 可以設定為任何集合，實作。 can be set to any collection that implements . 若要避免執行時期變更時所發生的衝突和，您應該使用而不是設定和個別。To avoid conflicts at run time that can occur when changing and , you should use instead of setting and individually. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有和表示使用者資料時發生錯誤。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. 此程式碼假設您已建立並填入名為`dataSet1`包含名為`dataTable1`。This code assumes you have created and populated a named `dataSet1` containing a named `dataTable1`. 當您繫結來控制，例如控制項，透過指定的錯誤物件會顯示為錯誤的字符控制項。When you bind the to a control such as the control, errors specified through objects appear as error glyphs in the control. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來開啟檔案對話方塊之前檢查是否發生錯誤。The following code example uses the method to check for an error before opening a file dialog box. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`TextBox1`，則名為`OpenFileDialog1`，名為按鈕`Button1`，和名為`ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a button named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetIconPadding(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 要為其取得填補的控制項。

span.span: The control to get the padding for.

summary.span: 傳回錯誤圖示旁邊留下的額外空間數量。

span.span: Returns the amount of extra space to leave next to the error icon.

returns.span: 圖示和控制項之間留下的像素數。

span.span: The number of pixels to leave between the icon and the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多的圖示通常擁有其中央的映像，周圍的額外空間，因此時才會需要額外的空間是必要的邊框距離值。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary if additional space is necessary. 邊框距離值可以是正數或負數。Padding values can be positive or negative. 負值會導致重疊的邊緣的圖示。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. 預設圖示填補為 0。The default icon padding is 0.

span.span: is .

span.span: The default icon consists of an exclamation point in a circle with a red background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了獲得最佳結果，使用大小為 16 x 16 像素的圖示。For best results, use an icon of the size 16 x 16 pixels. 指定的圖示會調整大小為 16 x 16 像素為單位，如有必要。Specified icons are resized to be 16 x 16 pixels, if necessary.

span.span: The assigned value of the is .

Protected Overridable Sub OnRightToLeftChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnRightToLeftChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnRightToLeftChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為 true，錯誤圖示會出現在相關聯的控制項的左邊，工具提示文字會顯示在由右至左的順序。When this property is set to true, the error icon appears to the left of the associated control and the ToolTip text is displayed in right-to-left order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 當 屬性值變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ErrorProvider1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ErrorProvider1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#382)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#382)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetError (System.Windows.Forms.Control control, string value);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetError(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control, string value) cil managed
public: void SetError(System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ control, System::String ^ value);

param.name: control
param.span: 要為其設定錯誤描述字串的控制項。

span.span: The control to set the error description string for.

param.name: value
param.span: 用以移除錯誤的錯誤描述字串，或是 或 。

span.span: The error description string, or or to remove the error.

summary.span: 設定指定控制項的錯誤描述字串。

span.span: Sets the error description string for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果長度`value`是小於或等於零，則會顯示錯誤圖示，並且錯誤圖示的工具提示將錯誤描述文字。If the length of `value` is greater than zero, then the error icon is displayed, and the ToolTip for the error icon is the error description text. 如果長度為零或`value`是`null`，錯誤圖示已隱藏。If the length is zero or `value` is `null`, the error icon is hidden. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以通知有資料項目錯誤的使用者。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立，其中包含控制控制項，和控制，每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用並屬性並和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，取決於控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最後一個圖示的位置修改邊框距離值的圖示。The final placement of the icon is modified by the icon padding values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以通知有資料項目錯誤的使用者。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立，其中包含控制控制項，和控制，每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用並屬性並和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，取決於控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. span.span: The to set the padding for.

param.name: padding
param.span: 圖示和 之間加入的像素數。

span.span: The number of pixels to add between the icon and the .

summary.span: 設定指定控制項和錯誤圖示之間留下的額外空間數量。

span.span: Sets the amount of extra space to leave between the specified control and the error icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多的圖示通常擁有其中央的映像，周圍的額外空間，因此需要額外的空間時，才需要的邊框距離值。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary when additional space is necessary. 邊框距離值可以是正數或負數。Padding values can be positive or negative. 負值會導致重疊的邊緣的圖示。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以通知有資料項目錯誤的使用者。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立，其中包含控制控制項，和控制，每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用並屬性並和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，取決於控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control.
